item.description:
Test: LaTeX examples

This post demonstrates basic LaTeX in Hugo Markdown.

Inline math example: Euler’s identity $e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$ inside a sentence.

Display math (centered): $$ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2},dx = \sqrt{\pi} $$

Quadratic formula: $$ x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a} $$

Aligned equations: $$ \begin{aligned} f(x) &= ax^2 + bx + c \ f’(x) &= 2ax + b \end{aligned} $$

Note: Ensure your Hugo site loads KaTeX or MathJax for rendering (e.g., include the KaTeX JS/CSS in your layout).
